Heads up! This web app was designed to work in Google Chrome. You're not using Chrome, so this might not work as intended.

Connect to Trello

Before you can use Dash for Trello, you need to connect to Trello.

Dash for Trello will redirect you to the Trello website to log in.
When you're done, you'll return here.

Connect to Trello

Display options

Layout

Columns

Other

Time to print

You might need to change your printer's settings in order for the Board to print correctly.

Set margins to 0mm and change the print backgrounds and images setting to on.

Something still not right?

This web app was tested in Google Chrome. If you're not using Chrome and things don't look right, change your browser to Chrome. If you're already using Chrome, and something's still not right, file a bug report.
